actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the United States should withdraw from the International Labor Organization unless such organization corrects its actions of a primarily political character.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the United States should withdraw from the International Labor Organization at the end of two years from the passage of this resolution unless such organization corrects its actions of a primarily political character and focuses its activities on the purposes outlined in its charter.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the United States should withdraw from the International Labor Organization unless such organization corrects its actions of a primarily political character.
